//method to generate all permutations of a string....:)
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
char s[1000];
void swap(char *x,char *y)
{
  char t;
  t=*x;
  *x=*y;
  *y=t;

}
void permutation(int i,int p)
{
    int j;
    if(i==p)
    {
        cout<<s<<endl;
    }
    else
    {
        for(j=i;j<=p;j++)
        {
            swap((s+i),(s+j));
            permutation(i+1,p);
            swap((s+i),(s+j));
        }
    }
}
int main()
{
    int p,x,i,j;

    cin>>s;
    x=strlen(s);
    p=x-1;
    permutation(0,p);
    return(0);
}
